channel.title: Making gmod work without connecting to steam
channel.description: if i have no internet connection is it possible? can i re-direct the connection to the steam server to my machine using my hosts file and the game will load? or will this not work

item.title: Making gmod work without connecting to steam
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Try Steambuster.

Here you find it: http://www.freesteam.org/forums/clients-cracks-launchers/6097-steam-buster-revolution-orangebox-rc3.html

If the Steambuster window don’t show up, go to sbrev.ini
And change the Top and Left line values to anything non negative like I did here.
Top=490
Left=215

Read full topic
item.source: Making gmod work without connecting to steam

item.title: Making gmod work without connecting to steam
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

If you download Gmod with cracksteam you can play it offline and on the non-steam servers, but not the ones on the server list. Setti has a couple of servers on their “other” games list.

Read full topic
item.source: Making gmod work without connecting to steam

item.title: Making gmod work without connecting to steam
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Just use one of the many steam emulators or nosteam cracks?

GMod wil probably even work with UCL
